00210                                                         "ParametersHandler_GetIndexByName",
00211                                                         "Parametr Name is NULL");

) 
  

00165 {
00166         if(     IPDRConfigurationMAX == 0 || 
00167                 (*Index) >= IPDRConfigurationMAX || 
00168                 (*Index) == 0xFFFFFFFF)
00169         {
00170                 (*Name) = NULL ;
00171                 (*Value) = NULL ;
00172                 (*DefValue) = NULL ;
00173                 (*Index) = 0xFFFFFFFF ;

IPDR_Status ParametersHandler_ParametrsInit (  IPDR_ExporterHandle  ExporterHandle,
ParametersHandler *  P
) 
  

00086 {
00087         unsigned long   Index = 0;
00088         const char*             Value = NULL ;
00089         Exporter *E = NULL;
00090         if( !ExporterHandle )
00091                 return IPDR_ERR;
00092 
00093         E = ExporterHandle;
00094 
00095         ParamsLog = &(E->ExporterLog);
00096 
00097         Log_Write(ParamsLog, IPDR_PLATFORM_MODULE_ID, IPDR_LEVEL_INFO,
00098                            "ParametersHandler_ParametrsInit",
00099                            "Configuration Initialization...");
00100 
00101         if ( !P || ! P->ParamsFunc)
00102                 Log_Write(ParamsLog, IPDR_PLATFORM_MODULE_ID, IPDR_LEVEL_WARNING,
00103                            "ParametersHandler_ParametrsInit",
00104                            "Parametrs Handler Func is NULL, All configuration Will Initialized Default...");
00105 
00106         for( Index = 0 ; IPDRConfiguration[Index].ID != 0xFFFFFFFF ; Index++)
00107         {
00108                 if ( P && P->ParamsFunc)
00109                 {
00110                         Value = P->ParamsFunc(IPDRConfiguration[Index].Name, P->ParamsArg);
00111                         if (Value != NULL)
00112                         {
00113                                 strncpy(IPDRConfiguration[Index].Value, Value, MAX_CONFIG_STR_LEN);
00114                                 IPDRConfiguration[Index].Initialized = 1 ;
00115                                 Log_Write3(ParamsLog, IPDR_PLATFORM_MODULE_ID, IPDR_LEVEL_INFO,
00116                                                                         "ParametersHandler_ParametrsInit",
00117                                                                         "<%.98s>=<%.98s>[%.98s]",
00118                                                                         IPDRConfiguration[Index].Name,
00119                                                                         IPDRConfiguration[Index].Value,
00120                                                                         IPDRConfiguration[Index].DefValue);
00121 }
00122                         else
00123                         {
00124                                 IPDRConfiguration[Index].Value[0] = '\0' ;
00125                                 IPDRConfiguration[Index].Initialized = 0 ;
00126                                 Log_Write3(ParamsLog, IPDR_PLATFORM_MODULE_ID, IPDR_LEVEL_INFO,
00127                                                                         "ParametersHandler_ParametrsInit",
00128                                                                         "<%.98s>=<%.98s>[%.98s]",
00129                                                                         IPDRConfiguration[Index].Name,
00130                                                                         IPDRConfiguration[Index].Value,
00131                                                                         IPDRConfiguration[Index].DefValue);
00132                         }
00133                 }
00134                 
00135         }
00136         IPDRConfigurationMAX = Index-1 ;
00137         return IPDR_OK ;
00138 }

const char *  Param,
int  Value
) 
  

00397 {
00398     unsigned long Index;
00399         if (! Param)
00400                 return IPDR_ERR_INVALID_VALUE;
00401 
00402     Index = ParametersHandler_GetIndexByName(Param);
00403         if(0xFFFFFFFF == Index || IPDRConfigurationMAX < Index)
00404                 return IPDR_ERR_INVALID_VALUE ;
00405 
00406         sprintf(IPDRConfiguration[Index].Value, "%d", Value);
00407         IPDRConfiguration[Index].Initialized = 1 ;
00408         return IPDR_OK ;
00409 }
